cards.back:
debug /diːˈbʌɡ/

Nghĩa: Tìm và sửa lỗi trong code

Example:
We need to debug the authentication system before deployment.
The developer spent hours debugging the memory leak issue.

Collocation:
  • debug code/system/issue
  • debugging tools
  • debug mode

deploy /dɪˈplɔɪ/

Nghĩa: Triển khai, đưa vào sử dụng

Example:
We will deploy the new version to production tomorrow.
The team successfully deployed the application to AWS.

Collocation:
  • deploy application/code
  • deploy to production
  • deployment pipeline

refactor /riːˈfæktə/

Nghĩa: Tái cấu trúc code để cải thiện chất lượng mà không thay đổi chức năng

Example:
Let's refactor this codebase to improve maintainability.
The legacy code needs to be refactored for better performance.

Why refactor?
  • Improve code readability
  • Reduce complexity
  • Easier maintenance

optimize /ˈɒptɪmaɪz/

Nghĩa: Tối ưu hóa, làm cho hiệu quả nhất

Example:
We need to optimize the database queries to reduce loading time.
The algorithm was optimized to handle millions of requests.

Collocation:
  • optimize performance
  • optimize for speed
  • optimization techniques

scalability /ˌskeɪləˈbɪləti/

Nghĩa: Khả năng mở rộng quy mô của hệ thống

Example:
The system was designed with scalability in mind.
Cloud infrastructure provides better scalability than traditional servers.

Types:
  • Horizontal scalability (scale out)
  • Vertical scalability (scale up)
